title: SKT skins?
body: Does anyone know something about the release date? It has been a week after 6.16 update.

replies.body: We don't have any information on new content to share.  Per the [Patch 6.16 patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-616-notes), it's on the way so stay updated on our[ news page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) until then.  Hang tight!
